title: Fingerprint issue after latest update
content:
Just received the latest update for the Pixel 3 XL 10(OP1A.190711.020.C3) and noticed that the fingerprint sensor had stopped working for apps but allowed me to unlock my phone.

I had done the usual reboots but again I've had to reboot device again to get the fingerprint options working within apps

has anyone else experienced this issue with the October update?
